channel.title: Entire Continent of Australia joins the Left 4 Dead 2 Boycott
channel.description:
[url]https://xbox360.ign.com/articles/102/1025648p1.html[/url]
This is complete bullshit. Seriously. Countries like Australia and Germany need to grow some balls and let the consumers decide what the people play rather than their nanny government.
[i]"And I'm proud to be and American, where at least I know I'm, free!..."... [/i]to set ZOMBIES on FIRE with AMMO! [i]"And I won't forget, the..." [/i]ZOMBIES [i]"...that died, and gave that right to me!"[/i]

item.title: Entire Continent of Australia joins the Left 4 Dead 2 Boycott
item.dc:creator: JohnKiller118
item.description:
Here’s some gameplay of Ethnic Cleansing.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=E0x-YNdJ-po

The black enemies are voiced by monkies. I’m the one that kicked off this “offensive game” conversation, and I want to puke. That’s saying somthing.

Postal 2 looks like a kiddie game compared to the amount of awful in this game. Plus, Postal 2 was offensive for the sake of fun, but the game was still mediocre. But THIS is the definition of tasteless!

Read full topic
item.source: Entire Continent of Australia joins the Left 4 Dead 2 Boycott

item.title: Entire Continent of Australia joins the Left 4 Dead 2 Boycott
item.dc:creator: Ramirezoid
item.description:
I remember a few years back when that kid on Newgrounds released “V-Tech shootout.”

I’m going to hell because I voted 5 for gameplay.

Read full topic
item.source: Entire Continent of Australia joins the Left 4 Dead 2 Boycott

item.title: Entire Continent of Australia joins the Left 4 Dead 2 Boycott
item.dc:creator: JohnKiller118
item.description:
By the way, you’re link for “Ethnic Cleansing” doesn’t work. Here’s the article:
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ethnic_Cleansing_(video_game)
I’M offended! At least MY offensive jokes are just in good fun. These guys are actual Neo-Nazis!
How can someone be deluded into believing in this bullshit racist crap?
And why does everyone hate Jews?

Edit: Okay, what the fuck is wrong with our links?

Read full topic

item.title: Entire Continent of Australia joins the Left 4 Dead 2 Boycott
item.dc:creator: Someonerandm
item.description:
Ethnic Cleansing is often cited as a milestone in the use of “the latest videogame technology”

Your game may have a chance.

Read full topic
item.source: Entire Continent of Australia joins the Left 4 Dead 2 Boycott

item.title: Entire Continent of Australia joins the Left 4 Dead 2 Boycott
item.dc:creator: JohnKiller118
item.description:
Pokemon Eater:

And to counterract yourr proposal fro the most offensive game ever, I propose you make the worst game ever. Think Drake of the 99 Dragons mixed woth E.T. Now think worse.

No.
If my dream project (which I have dubbed “Murder Simulator” for now) ever gets developed, I want it to be awesome. I want to be the Tim Shafer of tasteless humor.

Read full topic

item.title: Entire Continent of Australia joins the Left 4 Dead 2 Boycott
item.dc:creator: Pokemon_Eater
item.description:
I seriously doubt a game like yours is going to have any problems getting put on the shelves, since this https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/KZ_manager and this https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ethnic_Cleansing_(video_game) have been made.

And to counterract yourr proposal fro the most offensive game ever, I propose you make the worst game ever. Think Drake of the 99 Dragons mixed woth E.T. Now think worse.

Read full topic

item.title: Entire Continent of Australia joins the Left 4 Dead 2 Boycott
item.dc:creator: Master_Chef
item.description:
You will unlock the Hump of Life ability, which fully ressurects and revives anyone in the game, be it a dead ally, or a fallen enemy, who you will be able to kill again for additional experience.

item.description:

+5 EXP in your necrophilia skill? Sound useful.

Maybe at level 20 you could summon mutant zombie hookers from the depths of hell to steal the souls of innocent children?

+5 EXP in your necrophilia skill? Sound useful.

item.source: Entire Continent of Australia joins the Left 4 Dead 2 Boycott

item.title: Entire Continent of Australia joins the Left 4 Dead 2 Boycott
item.dc:creator: Someonerandm
item.description:
Jambo:

Yeah… except that L4D got through last year just fine =\

Twas sarcasm. (If you did know it was sarcasm, then ignore this comment, but I have experience waaaaaaaaay too many people who do not understand sarcasm, even in person, let alone over teh internets.)

Also, I suspect ugliness of an enemy is directly related to how satisfying an enemy is to kill, so I am looking forward to spawning 100 of those things and mowing them all down with an auto-shotgun.

Read full topic
item.source: Entire Continent of Australia joins the Left 4 Dead 2 Boycott

item.title: Entire Continent of Australia joins the Left 4 Dead 2 Boycott
item.dc:creator: JohnKiller118
item.description:
Master Chef:

You should regain health either by:

A ) Raping anyone you see if they’re still alive (full health regained)
B ) Canibalizing corpses (regain tiny bit of health)
or
C ) Saluting a Hitler Poster or other Nazi flags, knick knacks, etc. (Constant health regain)

All NPC’s must be 300% pressurized blood, macho muscle doods if male or big breasted sluts if female, and have an option for random TK’ing.

And the aliens need dildo heads.

You’re the best. We need to make this game together!

Read full topic
item.source: Entire Continent of Australia joins the Left 4 Dead 2 Boycott

item.title: Entire Continent of Australia joins the Left 4 Dead 2 Boycott
item.dc:creator: JohnKiller118
item.description:
func_random:

If they think anything that looks like this
is even close a living human needs to go get their meds refilled.

EDIT: FUCK! That picture actually makes my stomach sick. I retract all statements. Aussie gov, you have my blessing

Oh come on. It’s not that bad. At least it won’t be once you shoot it with AMMO THAT SETS ZOMBIES ON FIRE!!![/SIZE]

Read full topic

item.title: Entire Continent of Australia joins the Left 4 Dead 2 Boycott
item.dc:creator: jambo
item.description:

‘It notes that this violence is "inflicted upon ‘the Infected’ who are living humans infected with a rabies-like virus that causes them to act violently."’

Makes sense.

Yeah… except that L4D got through last year just fine =\

item.title: Entire Continent of Australia joins the Left 4 Dead 2 Boycott
item.dc:creator: JohnKiller118
item.description:
It’s MY thread! I can do whatever I want with it!
So let’s keep both topics rolling. But keep it clean (or, as clean as my type of game gets) and here’s an article from Kotaku about what was in the game that got it banned:
https://kotaku.com/5361301/left-4-dead-2-banned-in-australia-%5Bupdate%5D

Read full topic
